title: Paula Deen's Broccoli Casserole
directions: Spray a 13 x 9 inch baking dish with cooking spray.
In a large bowl, combine broccoli, mayonnaise, cheese, soup and eggs.
Top with crushed crackers and pour the melted butter evenly over crackers.
Bake for 35 minutes or until set and browned.
ingredients: 2 (10 ounce) packages frozen chopped broccoli, cooked and drained
1 (10 3/4 ounce) can condensed broccoli and cheddar soup
